snippet: The jazz critic Ben Ratliff recalls an introduction to a vast range of music via a book of record jacket designs, “Album Cover Album.”
abstract: New York Times jazz critic Ben Ratliff recalls how he was introduced to vast range of music via a book of record jacket designs entitled Album Cover Album.
lead_paragraph: The jazz critic Ben Ratliff recalls an introduction to a vast range of music via a book of record jacket designs, “Album Cover Album.”

headline.seo: A Jazz Critic Inspired by a Book of Album Cover Designs
headline.main: A Feast for the Eyes Leads to One for the Ears
headline.print_headline: A Feast for the Eyes Leads To One for the Ears
